title: "Unable to connect to the login queue" can't login to Oceania
body:
Added firewall exceptions (even disabled temporarily), disabled AV, done DNS, protocols, full repair etc... no joy. Haven't been able to log in all day. This is a first time install on this box.

Anyone able to help?

I'm running Windows 10.

replies.body:
You've done some solid steps, so it's strange that you're still unable to reach the authentication server.  There are some additional steps to help in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  If that doesn't help, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead so our tech guys can take a closer look.

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to get grab some logs for more context, and we'll see you there.

Hey friend, I'm really sorry for the delayed response but I'm here!  I just saw your reply with those logs, but they don't say a lot that I could help with.  If you already got the logs from the HRT, reach out to us via email at support@riotgames.com.  Since you are having issues using the ticketing system, we can still correspond through email.

Regarding accessing the ticketing site itself, this is usually solved by clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  I hope that helps!

I can't even submit a ticket because whenever I try to login on the ticket server I get stuck in a stupid loop where it asks me to sign in, then I click that link and it tells me that it's signing me out which eventually gives me a "an error occurred, try again later" message.
